projects.title: Muzziball Custom OS Development
projects.description: A custom Linux-based operating system built using Yocto Project for the Muzziball device, integrating hardware components and providing a robust foundation for advanced features.

projects.title: Automotive Embedded System
projects.description: A comprehensive automotive embedded system combining STM32MP1 and i.MX93 processors, providing a robust platform for modern vehicle applications with real-time processing capabilities.

projects.title: Muzziball Smart Interactive Ball
projects.description: A sophisticated embedded system project that combines hardware and software to create an interactive ball with multiple sensors, actuators, and real-time data processing capabilities.

projects.title: Wireless Crack Detection System
projects.description: A sophisticated real-time crack detection system combining Acoustic Emission technology with IoT capabilities for infrastructure monitoring and structural health assessment.

projects.title: Secure IoT System with AWS Integration
projects.description: A comprehensive IoT security project implementing robust security measures throughout the IoT pipeline while providing intuitive monitoring and control interfaces.

projects.title: Smart Home IoT System with Android Control
projects.description: A comprehensive smart home automation system featuring Android application interface, ESP32-based hardware control, and Firebase cloud integration for secure access.

projects.title: Free Space Optical Communication System
projects.description: A comprehensive study and implementation of secure free space optical communication using LASER technology and AES encryption with theoretical analysis and practical implementation.

projects.title: Robust SmartStep: Anomaly Filtering for PDR
projects.description: A novel approach to improve step detection in Pedestrian Dead Reckoning systems using deep learning-based anomaly filtering to distinguish genuine walking signals from anomalies.

projects.title: RSNA Breast Cancer Detection
projects.description: Deep learning models for breast cancer detection from mammogram images, developed for the RSNA competition on Kaggle to improve early detection and survival rates.

projects.title: Contradictory Text Analysis NLP
projects.description: Classification of premise-hypothesis pairs into entailment, contradiction, or neutral categories using advanced NLP techniques and BERT-based models for multilingual text analysis.

projects.title: Dijkstra and Bellman-Ford RYU Controller
projects.description: An advanced Software-Defined Networking project implementing both Dijkstra and Bellman-Ford shortest-path algorithms using the RYU controller for optimal network routing.

projects.title: Load Balancing for Face Recognition Video Streaming
projects.description: A sophisticated load balancing solution for face recognition video streaming in wireless networks using Mininet-WiFi and RYU controller with QoS management.
